title: Journalism-ICT Collaborative Practical Competency Enhancement Course Based on Innovative Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: No foundational understanding of digital media or experience in content creation
context.additional_context: Journalism-ICT convergence training conducted on a smartphone-based LMS for in-service professionals, fostering the ability to create industry-applicable digital content through collaborative learning and individual practice.

learning_goals: Through three-stage collaborative learning (network/group/individual), develop one or more practical ICT-based journalism contents in collaboration with news media companies.
Utilize digital storytelling tools and perform collaborative projects using only smartphones in an online learning environment.
Produce a media solution prototype applicable to industrial settings, which can be submitted to industry-linked evaluators at the end of learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
